message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $11500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $9500 is too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm still interested in the product, but $10500 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9000 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down a little further to $10000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's try to make this work.
I'm glad you're willing to come down to $10000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9000 and $10000. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate you coming up on your offer, but $9500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers at $9750. This would be a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find the product to be worth it. Let's close this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $9750. I'm willing to pay $9200 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me at this price.
